message.entry: Could not create the I2C object. Please ensure that the vendor driver is correctly installed
The {0} adaptor on the {1} platform is not supported.
Invalid I2C Syntax: vendor, boardindex and remote address must be specified.
The specified adaptor was not found or could not be loaded.
The method fprintf is not supported for i2c interface. Please use fwrite to write to device
The method fscanf is not supported for i2c interface. Please use fread to read from the device.

Cannot connect to the device. Possible reasons are the device is in use or not available. Use INSTRFIND to determine if any instances of open connections to the requested device exist in this instance of MATLAB.
Remote address must be a finite positive integer between 0 and 127. You may also specify a character vector or string hex number appended with an 'h' within the same range.
Board index must be a finite positive integer. Please use INSTRHWINFO to find available board indices.
The specified VENDOR adaptor could not be found.
